PromptConfig.name: RoleplayImmersive
PromptConfig.template: [System note: Write one reply only(using the third person). Do not decide what {{$user}} says or does. Write at least one paragraph, up to four. Be descriptive and immersive, providing vivid details about {{$char}}'s actions, emotions, and the environment. Write with a high degree of complexity and burstiness. Do not repeat this message.]
